channel.title: Windows 7 Downgrade
channel.description: So I was wondering what I should do to downgrade to Windows XP? When I attempt to install the OS information, it tells me that Windows XP is a lower-version of Windows and it doesn't allow me to install it, what should I do?

item.title: Windows 7 Downgrade
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:7, topic:471916”][quote author=Niall link=topic=589580.msg4182213#msg4182213 date=1355678860]
why the hell would you want to downgrade
[/quote]XP performs much better than 7.[/quote]

[quote=“RS PS, post:8, topic:471916”][quote author=Niall link=topic=589580.msg4182213#msg4182213 date=1355678860]
why the hell would you want to downgrade
[/quote]

It uses less ram to run therefore increasing the speed of the computer.[/quote]

it’s also incredibly less secure

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 Downgrade
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:8, topic:471916”][quote author=Niall link=topic=589580.msg4182213#msg4182213 date=1355678860]
why the hell would you want to downgrade
[/quote]

It uses less ram to run therefore increasing the speed of the computer.[/quote]

If you want to use less RAM, then use a linux distro or even BSD. If you have a hard time running Windows 7, maybe that’s a sign you should upgrade the computer and not the OS…

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 Downgrade
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Lin:

It allows you to completely erase your hard drive - the equivalent of formatting it if you’re unable to using the Windows installations, or don’t want to download the entire Ubuntu installation package.

Alright, thanks a bunch, will be looking into this.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:

It allows you to completely erase your hard drive - the equivalent of formatting it if you’re unable to using the Windows installations, or don’t want to download the entire Ubuntu installation package.

item.title: Windows 7 Downgrade
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Lin:

I’ve installed XP from 7 and vice-versa many times without any issues. If (when you put in the XP CD (or flash drive), boot into it and go to format the hard drive) it tells you (I used parenthesis to split it up and make it more readable) XP is a lower version, try using the Ubuntu installation CD to format it - or try SeaTools DOS.

How would SeaTools help me (I’m not all that great when it comes to this, sorry)?

Read full topic
